1.name: Patrick
1.description: Patrick is Keith's followers. Regional leader near Vatican.

2.name: Angelina
2.description: Angelina is Keith's followers. Regional leader near Vatican with Patrick.

3.name: Keith
3.description: Keith is the grassroot trading movement leader that beat Wallstreet at their own games.

4.name: Athena
4.description: Greek Godess of Wisdom, war and art.

5.name: Anita
5.description: Anita is Marlow's robot. But she doesn't know that she is a robot.

6.name: Michael Cohen
6.description: Michael Cohen is Keith's followers. Kyoto regional leader.

7.name: Vince Lebar
7.description: The young Yale graduate who is ascending the social ladder under Marlow’s care. Manager Director of Twin-F Fund.

8.name: Michele Sindona
8.description: God’s banker. Il Burattinaio’s footman No.1, white glove, laundering 225 million dollars mafia’s money to Rome; Italy has been requesting his extradition from the U.S. Federal Prison to stand trial for murder.

9.name: Roberto Calvi
9.description: God’s banker. Il Burattinaio’s footman No. 2., stealing one billion dollars from the Bank of Italy.

10.name: Luigi Ronsisvalle
10.description: Mafia member, professional hitman. Threatening the life of witness, Nicola Biase in Sindona’s extradition case; also a contractor on the life of assistant United States attorney John Kenny, for just $100,000.

11.name: Tinker
11.description: Archer Norton’s magical weapon for time manipulation. Inspired by the Demon King T35NCB3J’s teaching, “Time flies and passing one’s life in acceleration.” Tinker is the feather on time arrows that changes its velocity.

12.name: Psyche
12.description: Psyche is Rachel's god form. A higher self she invokes when goes into battle.

13.name: Oliver
13.description: A goblin that knows where the magical treasure hides.

14.name: Eris
14.description: I am chaos. Order, the illusory veil drapes over me.

15.name: Χάρων
15.description: Charon, First-Frontier Temple’s clergies ferrying time travelers at the border of each stations.

16.name: The Veil of the Swarm
16.description: Eris’s veil. Beneath the orderly waggle dance, there is chaos.

17.name: Falcon
17.description: Temple of the First-Frontier’s warrior monks

18.name: Avenger's Sting
18.description: A bee avenges itself with a suicidal sting. Forged with the same curse on the Roman pugio that killed Caesar.

19.name: Anna's Scapegoat
19.description: The pugio that killed Julius Caesar (etched on it EID.MAR, the date Romans settle all debts.)
